Key Match Events: Sean Manaea pitched into the seventh inning of the Mets' 8-3 victory to open this critical series against the Diamondbacks.
Pre-Game Insights: Manaea watched Chris Sale pitch well against the Mets on July 25 and took notes, which sparked his late-summer resurgence.
Post-Match Reflections: Manaea has worked aggressively against opposing hitters, showcasing a command of counts that often eluded him earlier in the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Manaea has increased his strikeout rate by more than 45 percent, up to 32.7 percent, which is similar to Chris Sale's strikeout rate on the season.
Others: Manaea has made adjustments to his pitch mix, including dropping his release point, simplifying his repertoire, and reintroducing his changeup with a revised grip.
